page.title: 08Day in the life of my family
page.content:
------Saturday June 1st AM------
My parents' day started at 3.00am. when my sister woke up for a feed.My dad spent 2 more hours trying to put my sister to sleep. At 7.ooam, I woke up. I then read in bed until breakfast time. After having a good read I went downstairs and played on my computer. At 9.15 we were all washed and ready for breakfast. After breakfast we all got ready for town. At midday we went to town to get shoes for my brother and myself. It didn't take very long so my mum and I left my dad to pay and we went to British Home Stores and then to Marks and Spencers where we bought tennis shorts.
